assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Sakai Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. provides various chemical products in Japan. It offers titanium dioxide used in a range of applications, including paints, printer inks, paper manufacturing, plastics, chemical fibers, rubbers, and porcelain enamel, as well as in optical glasses and capacitors; and barium and strontium products used in compound form in electronic materials, paints, inks, plastics, glasses, and cosmetics. The company also provides zinc products, including zinc oxide used in various applications, such as rubber and paints, plastics, electronic materials, and cosmetics, as well as zinc dust used in anticorrosive paints; and plastic additives, such as stabilizers, lubricants, light stabilizers, and flame retardants used in pipes, joints, electrical wires, atypical extrusions, industrial films, flexible plastic films, and wall papers. In addition, the company offers catalysts comprising De-NOx catalysts/De-DXN catalysts, hydrogenation catalysts, ozone decomposition catalysts, polyester polymerization catalysts, and photo catalysts; electronic materials consisting of dielectric ceramics and piezoelectric ceramics; and pharmaceuticals, including prescription and OTC drugs, health foods, active pharmaceutical ingredients, and pharmaceutical intermediates. Additionally, the company provides organic chemical products for use in electronics, resin materials, healthcare, lubricants, and water treatment materials sectors; and road marking materials used for various traffic restrictions, guides, information, warnings, and assistance. Sakai Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Sakai, Japan.
